claims.object: all of the ways that someone communicates besides talking
trouble with speech or language skills

surface_layer.definition: AAC means all of the ways that someone communicates besides talking.
common_uses: Communication for people with speech or language difficulties

deep_layer.mechanism: AAC encompasses a range of tools and strategies to support communication, including picture exchange systems, communication boards, and speech-generating devices.
deep_layer.origin: Developed to assist individuals with communication impairments.

examples: Using a communication board with pictures to express needs and wants.
